title: Create an online shopfront for your brand.
description: Our web app is built from the ground up to suit small medium food businesses. It is powered by Microsoft Azure and Stripe for a robust and secure order processing.

title: Gain access to a commercial kitchen.
description: Outgrown your home kitchen? Gain access to a commercial kitchen at an affordable hourly rate. No minimum commitments!

title: Just pack them, we'll handle the logistics.
description: We will pick up your packed meals at our agreed schedule and deliver them to your customers' doorstep in a temperature-controlled transport. Your customers can track their orders online, live!
